comment.body:
In Firefox-based browsers, clicking on the video player does not work. The filter at the bottom is needed. 
It also opens a popup window on first click.

`vkfilmizlet.net###reklamCodeiframe_yeni`

issue.title: ytmp3s.nu
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://ytmp3s.nu/L89x/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fytmp3s.nu%2FL89x%2F) ### Comment > When clicking the download button it directs to a website with ads that. I can't block the ads on the pop up website and keeps coming back each time I block any stuff on the page with the "block ads on this website" feature. I'm only using adguard as my pop up blocker and ad remover. I've updated chrome recently as well as adguard. I also tried re-installing adguard to see if that was the issue and it didn't fix anything. Adguard works on other websites, but not the one I tried to access. ### Screenshots

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
